HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: - Guests' colony friends are now highlighted green in the social tab|- Special relationships (e.g. relatives) now count double!|- New opt-in setting to get notified when guests buy things|- Known visitors will return much more often now!||I'm working on an exciting (non-Rimworld) personal project. It would be awesome if you'd play it and give me feedback! Click the link above for more information.
